verses.verse: This was the lot <WH1486> for the tribe <WH4294> of Manasseh, <WH4519> for he was the firstborn <WH1060> of Joseph. <WH3130> As for Machir <WH4353> the firstborn <WH1060> of Manasseh, <WH4519> the father <WH1> of Gilead, <WH1568> because he was a man <WH376> of war, <WH4421> therefore he had Gilead <WH1568> and Bashan. <WH1316>

So this was for the rest <WH3498> of the children <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> according to their families: <WH4940> for the children <WH1121> of Abiezer, <WH44> for the children <WH1121> of Helek, <WH2507> for the children <WH1121> of Asriel, <WH844> for the children <WH1121> of Shechem, <WH7928> for the children <WH1121> of Hepher, <WH2660> and for the children <WH1121> of Shemida: <WH8061> these were the male <WH2145> children <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> the son <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130> according to their families. <WH4940>

But Zelophehad, <WH6765> the son <WH1121> of Hepher, <WH2660> the son <WH1121> of Gilead, <WH1568> the son <WH1121> of Machir, <WH4353> the son <WH1121> of Manasseh, <WH4519> had no sons, <WH1121> but daughters: <WH1323> and these are the names <WH8034> of his daughters: <WH1323> Mahlah, <WH4244> Noah, <WH5270> Hoglah, <WH2295> Milcah, <WH4435> and Tirzah. <WH8656>

They came near <WH7126> before <WH6440> Eleazar <WH499> the priest, <WH3548> and before <WH6440> Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun, <WH5126> and before <WH6440> the princes, <WH5387> saying, <WH559> "Yahweh <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872> to give <WH5414> us an inheritance <WH5159> among <WH8432> our brothers. <WH251>" Therefore according to the commandment <WH6310> of Yahweh <WH3068> he gave <WH5414> them an inheritance <WH5159> among <WH8432> the brothers <WH251> of their father. <WH1>
Ten <WH6235> parts <WH2256> fell <WH5307> to Manasseh, <WH4519> besides the land <WH776> of Gilead <WH1568> and Bashan, <WH1316> which is beyond <WH5676> the Jordan; <WH3383>

because the daughters <WH1323> of Manasseh <WH4519> had <WH5157> an inheritance <WH5159> among <WH8432> his sons. <WH1121> The land <WH776> of Gilead <WH1568> belonged to the rest <WH3498> of the sons <WH1121> of Manasseh. <WH4519>

The border <WH1366> of Manasseh <WH4519> was from Asher <WH836> to Michmethath, <WH4366> which is before <WH6440> Shechem. <WH7927> The border <WH1366> went along <WH1980> to the right hand, <WH3225> to the inhabitants <WH3427> of En Tappuah. <WH5887>
The land <WH776> of Tappuah <WH8599> belonged to Manasseh; <WH4519> but Tappuah <WH8599> on the border <WH1366> of Manasseh <WH4519> belonged to the children <WH1121> of Ephraim. <WH669>

The border <WH1366> went down <WH3381> to the brook <WH5158> of Kanah, <WH7071> southward <WH5045> of the brook. <WH5158> These cities <WH5892> belonged to Ephraim <WH669> among <WH8432> the cities <WH5892> of Manasseh. <WH4519> The border <WH1366> of Manasseh <WH4519> was on the north side <WH6828> of the brook, <WH5158> and ended <WH8444> at the sea. <WH3220>

Southward <WH5045> it was Ephraim <WH669>'s, and northward <WH6828> it was Manasseh <WH4519>'s, and the sea <WH3220> was his border. <WH1366> They reached <WH6293> to Asher <WH836> on the north, <WH6828> and to Issachar <WH3485> on the east. <WH4217>

Manasseh <WH4519> had three <WH7969> heights <WH5316> in Issachar, <WH3485> in Asher <WH836> Beth Shean <WH1052> and its towns, <WH1323> and Ibleam <WH2991> and its towns, <WH1323> and the inhabitants <WH3427> of Dor <WH1756> and its towns, <WH1323> and the inhabitants <WH3427> of Endor <WH5874> and its towns, <WH1323> and the inhabitants <WH3427> of Taanach <WH8590> and its towns, <WH1323> and the inhabitants <WH3427> of Megiddo <WH4023> and its towns. <WH1323>

Yet the children <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> couldn't <WH3201> drive out <WH3423> the inhabitants of those cities; <WH5892> but the Canaanites <WH3669> would <WH2974> dwell <WH3427> in that land. <WH776>

It happened, <WH1121> when the children of Israel <WH3478> had grown strong, <WH2388> that they put <WH5414> the Canaanites <WH3669> to forced labor, <WH4522> and didn't <WH3423> utterly drive them out. <WH3423>

The children <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130> spoke <WH1696> to Joshua, <WH3091> saying, <WH559> "Why have you given <WH5414> me just one <WH259> lot <WH1486> and one <WH259> part <WH2256> for an inheritance, <WH5159> since I am a great <WH7227> people, <WH5971> because <WH5704> Yahweh <WH3068> has blessed <WH1288> me so far? <WH3541>"

Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> to them, <WH7227> "If you are a great people, <WH5971> go up <WH5927> to the forest, <WH3293> and clear <WH1254> land for yourself there in the land <WH776> of the Perizzites <WH6522> and of the Rephaim; <WH7497> since the hill country <WH2022> of Ephraim <WH669> is too narrow for you. <WH213>"

The children <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130> said, <WH559> "The hill <WH2022> country is not enough <WH4672> for us. <WH3669> All the Canaanites who dwell <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of the valley <WH6010> have chariots <WH7393> of iron, <WH1270> both those who are in Beth Shean <WH1052> and its towns, <WH1323> and those who are in the valley <WH6010> of Jezreel. <WH3157>"

Joshua <WH3091> spoke <WH559> to the house <WH1004> of Joseph, <WH3130> even to Ephraim <WH669> and to Manasseh, <WH4519> saying, <WH559> "You are a great <WH7227> people, <WH5971> and have great <WH7227> power. <WH3581> You shall not have one <WH259> lot only; <WH1486>

but the hill <WH2022> country shall be yours. <WH3293> Although it is a forest, you shall cut it down, <WH1254> and it <WH8444>'s farthest extent shall be yours; <WH3423> for you shall drive out the Canaanites, <WH3669> though they have chariots <WH7393> of iron, <WH1270> and though they are strong. <WH2389>"
